name: chicken-feed-calculator
description: Smart poultry feed management system for African farmers

scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=web && npm run lint --workspace=mobile
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=web && npm run test --workspace=mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=web && npm install --workspace=mobile
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules web/node_modules mobile/node_modules web/.next mobile/.expo

author: Chicken Feed Calculator Team
